channel.title: Some Questions
channel.description:
1. How can i make it that NPC's automatically attack you when you're walkin like next to them? 2. I'm using CheezeScape 80 atm, what do i need to delete so there is no snow dust etc when you log in, but keeping the day/night effects on? 3. (within CHeezescape 80) When you die you keep 3 items, but they don't drop on the ground, where to change to let them drop and the owner (the one who killed you) pick them up? 4. Lunar spells....
Already Thx

item.title: Some Questions

item.description:
@WiZzLe wrote:

You can’t use Lunar spells yet because the clients we have don’t have support for them yet, as for your other 3 questions, i dont know
